All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
 class DrawPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel

Displays the interaction area and controls the dog monitor.

Author:
Karel Bergmann

calculateLocation

private java.awt.Point calculateLocation(Dog aDog)
Calculates the location of a dog on the canvas, given the location of the dog in the arena.

Parameters:
aDog - The dog whose canvas position to find.
Returns:
Point indicating the dog's relative position on the canvas, given location in the arena.
See Also:
Arena, Dog

paintComponent

public void paintComponent(java.awt.Graphics g)
Paint the component. Lock while doing this to prevent ConcurrentModificationExceptions pertaining to the Dogs Vector in Arena.

paintComponent in class javax.swing.JComponent
